tool_description: List of employees and basic personal information
name: Employees
title: Employees

api_list.name: Get the Employee by ID
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the Employee by specific ID parameter

api_list.name: Get employees
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a randomly generated hundred of employees
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://employees11.p.rapidapi.com/employees"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "employees11.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://employees11.p.rapidapi.com/employees"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "employees11.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
